title: Repeater away
creator_credit: David Haythornthwaite, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: Shows the laying of the trans-Tasman circuit submarine telephone cable between New Zealand and Australia in 1976. Written and directed by David Haythornthwaite; photography Kerry Brown; sound Julian Ellingworth; commentary Peter Gwynne.
creator_credit_for_label: David Haythornthwaite, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
